results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0,n-1} 5^k*B(k)*binomial(n,k) where B(k) is the k-th Bernoulli number.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..467
mathematica: Range[0, 15]! CoefficientList[ Series[ 5x/(1 + Exp[x] + Exp[ 2x] + Exp[ 3x] + Exp[ 4x]), {x, 0, 15}], x] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 26 2012 *)
Table[Sum[5^k*BernoulliB[k] Binomial[n, k], {k, 0, n - 1}], {n, 0, 23}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 28 2016 *)
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, May 31 2003
